description: This file defines a RecyclerView Adapter for displaying a delivery timeline in an Android application, including view holder logic, data binding, and animations.

classes.name: DeliveryTimelineRow
classes.description: Data class representing a row in the delivery timeline, including stage info, completion status, timing, and ETA.

classes.name: DeliveryTimelineAdapter
classes.description: RecyclerView.Adapter subclass managing the display of delivery stages in a timeline view.

classes.name: DeliveryTimelineAdapter.VH
classes.description: ViewHolder class that binds delivery stage data to the individual timeline item views.

methods.name: submit
methods.description: Updates the adapter's data with a new list of DeliveryTimelineRow items.

methods.name: onCreateViewHolder
methods.description: Inflates the item layout and creates a new ViewHolder instance.

methods.name: getItemCount
methods.description: Returns the number of items in the data set.

methods.name: onBindViewHolder
methods.description: Binds data to the ViewHolder at the specified position, including triggering animations.

methods.name: bind
methods.description: Binds a DeliveryTimelineRow to the ViewHolder's views, updating icons, colors, texts, and visibility.

methods.name: animateStageAdvanceIfNeeded
methods.description: Performs micro-animations on the stage icon and connector if the stage is recently completed or current, and if animations are not reduced.
